title: Track Greenhouse Gas Emissions
description: An environmental officer tracks the mine's greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions to report them and identify reduction opportunities.

tasks.description: Gather the required activity data for the month, primarily the total diesel fuel consumed by the haul truck fleet and the total electricity consumed.
tasks.expected_outcome: The total fuel and electricity consumption figures are collected.

tasks.description: Calculate the Scope 1 (from diesel) and Scope 2 (from electricity) GHG emissions using standard emission factors.
tasks.expected_outcome: The total CO2-equivalent emissions for the month are calculated.

tasks.description: Update the corporate GHG emissions dashboard with the latest monthly data.
tasks.expected_outcome: The dashboard is updated, allowing management to track performance against reduction targets.
